item.title: Using Storybook and MSW in React Native
item.description: The integration between Storybook and Mock Service Worker enables you to develop components isolated from your app and your back-end server.

item.title: Node.js one-liner to read JSON files
item.description: How to use Node instead of jq for trivial property accessors.

item.title: Automating SVG to JSX conversion with svgr
item.description: Transforming SVG files into JSX is boring and prone to error. We can handle it better with svgr . Its defaults are good enough, but you’ll likely need to customize it for your needs, which is made possible by writing a template .

item.title: Implementing dark mode for static websites
item.description: From the basic to the hacky stuff you should do to deliver the best experience.

item.title: My experience testing React applications
item.description: Thoughts about writing integration tests for React apps, from react-testing-library to Cypress.

item.title: Migrating from create-react-app to Vite
item.description: How and why to migrate a CRA project to Vite.
